author: Lydia Smith
title: Denver Couple Get Locals to Howl at Moon Every Night to Show Coronavirus Solidarity
description: Shelsea Ochoa and Brice Maiurro came up with an idea to bring their friends together as both dealt with the consequences of the city's stay-at-home order.
content:
Communities in Denver are howling together each evening to show solidarity with people affected by the COVID-19 crisis.
Shelsea Ochoa and Brice Maiurro came up with an idea to bring their friends together as both dealt with the consequences of the city's sta… [+5062 chars]
